instructions: Open the Play Store app on your Android device. Slide out the left menu and select Account . If you have access to the country-switching option, you ll see a Country and profiles entry in this menu. Tap this Country category, and select your new country. Proceed through the prompts to add a new payment method for your current country, if needed. Review the warning prompt and accept the change. Once you ve switched countries, you re now able to browse the Play Store for that region. The change may take up to 24 hours to go into effect.
